籤詩版本二:
Dongosolo, buku, ndi bukhu musayerekeze kuchita mukaganiza musanaganize.
Nthawi ikafika, anthu olemekezeka angakuthandizeni, ndipo mutha kukhala mwamtendere ngati gable.
詩意:
Nyumba ya hexagram iyi ili ngati khoma.
Chilichonse ndi chotetezeka komanso chopanda ngozi.
解曰: Pangani china chatsopano kuchokera ku chinthu chakale. Maluwa ozizira amakumana ndi masika. Zoletsedwa m'mbuyomu. Tsopano ndakhutira.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Ji analangiza Yehova
Mu Ming Dynasty, Liu Ji, yemwe dzina lake laulemu anali Bowen ndi mutu womwalirayo Wencheng, anabadwira ku Qingtian (tsopano Wencheng County), Zhejiang.
Iye amawerengedwa bwino mu classics ndi mbiri, ndipo ndi bwino kulemba ndakatulo ndi nkhani. Analinso waluso pa zakuthambo ndi zankhondo ndipo adathandizira Zhu Yuanzhang kugwirizanitsa dziko lapansi.
Panthawiyo, Zhu Yuanzhang adasankha ndikutsogolera asilikali ake ku Anfeng, akuyembekeza kuti athetse mzinda wa Anfeng.
Liu Ji adabwera kudzamuletsa mwachangu, akumaganiza kuti akagonja akapita kumeneko. Monga Liu Ji amayembekezera, Zhu Yuanzhang adatsekeredwa.
Akuluakulu Xu Da ndi Chang Yuchun anabwera kudzamupulumutsa, ndipo Zhu Yuanzhang adatha kuthawa.
聖意: Ubwino wa nyumba ndi nyumba, chuma, zovuta zamalonda, ukwati, akazi oyendayenda ku Liujia, mphutsi za silika mochedwa, ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, kupeza anthu, kuzengedwa mlandu mochedwa, kusamuka, kutayika kwa katundu. ndipo palibe chifukwa, chifukwa cha matenda, kusunga manda m'phiri la Yan'an, ndi zabwino zonse.
第X籤: Wopambana ma lotale makumi awiri mphambu zisanu ndi ziwiri
